title: still haven't gotten new blue side icon
body: it's been a day now. won a co op vs ai game and still nothing. already got red side's from team builder. starting to think you can only get it from team builder. or is it just delayed that long idk

replies.body: It's not overly clear in the post (which I'm trying to get updated) but you can't get the icons from custom or Co-op modes.  Currently you can only get them from playing Team Builder.
